posts.post_content:
Well in the baseball theme of our first two kids (Henry Louis and Christopher Mathewson), we are naming our third (and final) child Adrian Joss (it was really hard finding a baseball name for a girl).  As with the other two, I am looking for a nice example of a card of Addie Joss.

PM me if you have something you'd be willing to part with - I'm not necessarily keen on T206's for this.

Okay, maybe a picture is warranted.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=274400&d=1495856062[/IMG]
